testcaseName: Dose #1 of a Non-U.S. Covid-19 Vaccine

administeredDoses.vaccineName: COVID-19 vaccine, vector-nr, rS-ChAdOx1, PF, 0.5 mL

doses.vaccineName: COVID-19 vaccine, vector-nr, rS-ChAdOx1, PF, 0.5 mL

generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient is administered only one dose of a two-dose Non-US Covid-19 vaccine schedule, that the dose is considered to be valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange: v4.20: Updated test case to align with Interim Clinical Considerations for "People who received Covid-19 vaccine outside of the United States" by changing dose #1 status to "Valid" and updating the test case description.
